Every time I wear this dress I get so many compliments. It's just so different than anything anyone is used to seeing. Color, texture, flourishes, asymmetrical hem line. It's so interesting to look at. Plus I love that I can wear this dress without a bra. The top is lined and has a more rigid structure, perfect for holding me in place (as long as there isn't any bouncing lol). I'm a 40F for reference. I feel magical in this dress. I love it so much.

I would say overall amazing but I gave 4 stars due to lack of durability for the straps especially for a heavier set woman like myself. It is gorgeous straps are just a bit too thin for myself. Still cute though and I did wear it.

评论概述: Not as cute as the pictures
评论详情: Looked and felt very cheap. Advertising pictures clearly altered because it’s definitely not made as cute as shown, more thrown together and messy than cute and flowy.

The overall quality and fit of this dress surpassed my expectations. I usually wear an 18/20 or xxl and this fit great, it still had movement without making me feel too big. All the lace details feel sturdy and the slip is a good thickness for modesty but lands a little short above my knees. It is a light color and for that reason the general shape of my tattoos did show through the skirt a little, but I wouldn’t say it is see through. It was perfect for beach photos and I’d say it was definitely worth the price I paid.

The material is really nice, it looks lovely in the picture but not at all flattering in person. There's a band around the waist that just doesn't hug your body like it should making the material look bulkier than it should be. Definitely doesn't seem like it's true to size based off of the sizing chart provided.

It was bought because I was a bridesmaid and I'm a little on the heavy side it was cute straps were a little iffy but held. Another bridesmaid had it on and she was average build and it looked awesome on her. Still very nice dress!

评论概述: Well made and true to size
评论详情: Super cute dress with soft comfortable lace. Has adjustable straps too which is great. Nice lining and love the gold piping. Highly recommend.

I bought this dress to wear to my cousin's vows renewal in the Dominican 🇩🇴 Republic. I am 5'5 and between 155 to160 pounds with wide hips. The material was soft, light and stretchy. There's a slip underneath the dress, so you cannot see through the dress. It was absolutely perfect for a beach wedding occasion. I love it and plan on wearing it more often with maybe some cowgirl boots and a jean jacket

This light blue sundress is an absolute chef’s kiss! It’s long, flowy, and has sneaky built-in shorts, which made it super comfortable but still totally sexy. I wore it in Italy, and it was perfect for sightseeing all day and taking pictures pretending to hold up the Leaning Tower of Pisa. (Spoiler: the tower still leans, but I looked fabulous trying!) The dress kept me cool in the hot Italian sun, and the built-in shorts meant I didn’t have to worry about any wardrobe malfunctions when the breeze hit. If you’re looking for a sundress that’s both cute and practical for travel pics, this is your new best friend!

评论概述: Size down - boob area was too big
评论详情: First of all, the size chart was not correct for me. According to the size chart I was to get an XXL, according to the chest size — but when I got it, the boob area was definitely to big especially by the armpit area. I tried to find a picture to show what I mean but it looks like the photographer did a good job at making me pose so it didn’t show. I did have to use strapless push up stick on bra but even without that, the armpit area was at least a size to big — I later ordered the beige one in XL and the armpit area did the same thing but my breasts fit in the dress way better then the XXL.  This dress was very comfortable and light weight. People on other reviews says it’s see through and it isn’t, the only see through part is the way bottom IMO. Overall this dress made me feel beautiful for my elopement day. More beautiful than I could ever imagine if I’m being honest. I will be wearing them both during the summer time a lot!
fit great. ordered a medium as I'm 5'1 130lbs

Great quality great price 💯 will be buying more in different colors

I really love the fit, and how flowy and breathable the fabric was. It was a little shorter than I expected. I’m 5 foot nine. The model in the picture must be short.

Bought this for a summer wedding. It's very comfortable. The only thing I disliked was you can't dry clean it, can't put it in dryer so I had to hang it up on my shower curtain rod and use the shower spray, let hang dry and wrinkles came out pretty good.  Also if you're busty, not really a good dress. The dress is made in my opinion, for smaller chested woman.  I don't think a strapless bra would even fit in the bust area of the dress.
